title: Ep18 Gossip at the Corpse Cart
description: This month, Gossip at the Corpse Cart delivers a case of extreme constipation, reveals why the Wine Coven might owe their dads new razors for Father's Day, and shows us the delightful, yet dark side of Animal Crossing. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
